name: GCControllerElement.SystemGestureState
desc: A state for handling input when an element is part of a system gesture.

items.name: case enabled
items.desc: A state that sends input to your app only after a gesture recognizer doesnâ€™t identify a gesture.

items.name: case alwaysReceive
items.desc: A state that sends input to your app and a gesture recognizer simultaneously.

items.name: case disabled
items.desc: A state that sends input to your app directly and not to a gesture recognizer.
